name: Call of Duty
description: Experience the thrill of the world's most beloved shooter game, now on your phone for on-the-go fun with console-quality HD graphics.

reviews.comment: Fast-paced action and great graphics. The best mobile FPS!

name: Netflix
description: Watch TV shows and movies recommended just for you, including award-winning Netflix original series, films, and documentaries.

reviews.comment: The best original content out there. Can't live without it!

name: PUBG
description: Drop into a massive battleground and fight to be the last one standing. Squad up and join the battle in this landmark battle royale game.

reviews.comment: The original and still one of the best battle royale experiences.

name: Disney+
description: The streaming home of your favorite stories. With unlimited entertainment from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic, there's always something exciting to watch.
features: Endless entertainment from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, etc.
Host virtual movie nights with GroupWatch

reviews.comment: The best place for all Marvel and Star Wars content. A must-have for any fan!

name: Angry Birds
description: The classic physics-based puzzler that started it all. Use the unique powers of the Angry Birds to destroy the greedy pigs' defenses!

reviews.comment: A true classic. Still as fun and addictive as the day it came out.

name: YouTube
description: Discover what the world is watching -- from the hottest music videos to what’s popular in gaming, fashion, beauty, news, learning and more.
features: Create and upload your own videos
Explore a vast library of content

reviews.comment: The home of online video. There's something for everyone.

name: Minecraft
description: Explore infinite worlds and build everything from the simplest of homes to the grandest of castles. Play in creative mode or mine deep in survival mode.

reviews.comment: Limitless creativity. I've spent thousands of hours in this game.

name: Prime Video
description: Watch movies, TV, and sports, including Amazon Originals like The Boys, The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel, and Tom Clancy’s Jack Ryan.

reviews.comment: Great selection of original shows and movies included with Prime.

name: Duolingo
description: Learn a new language with the world's #1 education app. Fun, bite-sized lessons make it easy to start learning over 40 languages.

reviews.comment: The best way to learn a language for free. The competitive leagues keep me motivated!

name: Khan Academy
description: Learn anything, for free. Thousands of interactive exercises, videos, and articles at your fingertips. Study math, science, economics, and more.
features: Vast learning library for all ages
Bookmark and download content for offline access

reviews.comment: This app is a lifesaver. It helped me understand calculus better than my textbook.

name: Coursera
description: Build skills with courses, certificates, and degrees online from world-class universities and companies like Google, IBM, and more.
features: Courses from 200+ top universities and companies
Flexible online learning on your schedule

reviews.comment: The Google Data Analytics certificate I earned here helped me land a new job. Truly life-changing.

name: Quizlet
description: Learn with flashcards, games, and expert-written solutions. Quizlet is the easiest way to practice and master what you’re learning.
features: Create your own flashcards or find existing ones
Different study modes like Learn and Test

reviews.comment: I wouldn't have survived my anatomy exams without Quizlet. The flashcards are essential for memorization.
